text: Hi Dennis, sorry for the radio silence, didn't see your msg come through. At the moment editing the head of the existing templates isn't on the roadmap but we're working on the ability to completely custom code a DnD template within Design Manager. Out of interest, what changes are you looking to make to the head?
Making a selectable template is indeed on the roadmap :+1:
For example--- align center on mobile. The designs we use often have the preheader with logo on left and view in browser on right. Fine for desktop, but at mobile breakpoint , not so hot
